title: aristocrat slots - 4 games *** NEW *** *** UPDATED ***
description:
Okay here are the 4 leaked Aristocrat pokies with a few tweaks by me.

1. No more shortcut. Just double click exe file.

2. Game Credits/Lines buttons reflect actual machine.

3. *** UPDATED *** New routine to center window (instead of top-left corner)

4. Don't have to uncheck "Belly Panel" before playing anymore.

5. Indian Dreaming has 2 exe's...with/without train jackpot.

6. No virtual hand, except for atlantis because it needs it for feature.

7. *** NEW *** Nicer Button Layout (less cluttered)

As always if you don't have sound you need to enable windows xp compatibility mode.

***NOTE***
windows positions calculated for windows 8. other versions of windows probably will not line up properly due to changes in windows ui (window borders etc).
